title: "Chinese carmakers jostle for edge in autonomous driving"
excerpt: "Shenzhen published a new set of rules which will allow autonomous commercial driving services to be offered in the tech hub from next month. That includes fully autonomous cars if such technology ever comes to fruition and meets safety requirements."
